entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 5. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening then increasing to 40 gusting to 70 overnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
